pkgmetadata.longdescription: Owen's T Function and Bivariate Normal Integral // Computes the Owen's T function or the bivariate normal integral using one of the following: modified Euler's arctangent series, tetrachoric series, or Vasicek's series. For the methods, see Komelj, J. (2023) doi:10.4236/ajcm.2023.134026 (or reprint arXiv:2312.00011 with better typography) and Vasicek, O. A. (1998) doi:10.21314/JCF.1998.015.
